short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear everything from the application storage, cookies, local storage, session storage, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a simple way to clear all cookies, local storage, session storage, and other web storage data with a single click. The user-friendly interface features a "Clear All Data" button and a log container for real-time feedback.

This extension will log you out of other websites, not just the one you are browsing.
